panels.description: Provides the names and sizes of the 5 largest databases in an instance/cluster. Data showing only from Primary node in replica set.
panels.title: Top 5 Databases By Size

panels.description: Provides the number of collections in the selected databases
panels.title: Collections in Database ($database)

panels.description: Provides the number of indexes in the selected databases
panels.title: Indexes in Database ($database)

panels.description: Average size of each document in bytes. dataSize divided by number of documents
panels.title: Avg Object Size in Database ($database)

panels.description: Total size of all indexes in a given database
panels.title: Index Size in Database ($database)

panels.description: Total size of uncompressed data in a database in bytes. May be larger than storageSize due to WT compression.
panels.title: Data Size for Database ($database)

panels.description: Show summary information on the top 5 collections that are most frequently read.
panels.title: Top 5 Hottest Collections by Read  (Total)

panels.description: Show summary information on the top 5 collections that are most frequently written to (insert, update, delete, etc.).
panels.title: Top 5 Hottest Collections by Write (Total)

panels.description: Show the 5 collections that are most frequently read.

targets.expr: topk (5, rate(sum by (environment, cluster, database, collection) (mongodb_top_queries_count{database =~ "$database",service_name=~"$service_name"})[$interval]))

panels.title: Top 5 Hottest Collections by Read (Rate)

panels.description: Show the 5 collections that are most frequently written to (insert, update, delete, etc.).

targets.expr: topk (5, rate(sum by (environment, cluster, database, collection) (mongodb_top_insert_count{database =~ "$database",service_name=~"$service_name"})+sum by (environment, cluster, database, collection) (mongodb_top_insert_count{database =~ "$database",service_name=~"$service_name"})+sum by (environment, cluster, database, collection) (mongodb_top_remove_count{database =~ "$database",service_name=~"$service_name"})+sum by (environment, cluster, database, collection) (mongodb_top_update_count{database =~ "$database",service_name=~"$service_name"})))

panels.title: Top 5 Hottest Collections by Write (Rate)

panels.description: Provides information on the rate of activity against the database then breaks down into activity type over the selected time period
panels.title: Collections statistics  for $database (rate)

panels.description: Provides summary information on the activity running against the database then breaks down into activity type over the selected time period
panels.title: Collections statistics  for $database (summary)

panels.description: Provides totals for each activity type hitting a database for collections

targets.expr: sum by (collection) (mongodb_top_queries_count {environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$replication_set", database=~"$database", service_name=~"$service_name"})
sum by (collection) (mongodb_top_insert_count {environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$replication_set", database=~"$database", service_name=~"$service_name"})
sum by (collection) (mongodb_top_remove_count {environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$replication_set", database=~"$database", service_name=~"$service_name"})
sum by (collection) (mongodb_top_update_count{environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$replication_set", database=~"$database", service_name=~"$service_name"})
sum by (collection) (mongodb_top_getmore_count {environment=~"$environment", cluster=~"$cluster", rs_nm=~"$replication_set", database=~"$database", service_name=~"$service_name"})

panels.title: Collections statistics  $database
